title: Evocation Spells
content: +Level 4 Spell Slot Item: Markoheshkir Otiluke's Resilient Sphere Lv 4 Evocation ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot The Large size or smaller target must succeedd on a Dex. save or be enclosed for the spell duration.
